generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with yellow and white lane markings, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area next to the road, separated by a curb, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multi-story residential and commercial buildings line both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a cloudy sky.
- person: Two individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A black SUV is visible driving ahead in the same direction as the camera.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign with a pedestrian crossing symbol is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, supporting signs and possibly streetlights.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the sidewalk on the right side, separating the pedestrian area from the road or property.
- terrain: Small patches of grass and soil are visible along the sidewalk edges and in some areas near the curb.
